property.name: oozie.service.CallableQueueService.threads
property.description: Number of threads used for executing callables

property.name: oozie.service.coord.normal.default.timeout
property.description: Default timeout for a coordinator action input check (in minutes) for normal job. -1 means infinite timeout

property.name: oozie.service.StoreService.create.db.schema
property.description:
Creates Oozie DB.
If set to true, it creates the DB schema if it does not exist. If the DB schema exists is a NOP. If set to false, it does not create the DB schema. If the DB schema does not exist it fails start up.

property.name: oozie.service.JPAService.create.db.schema
property.description:
Creates Oozie DB.
If set to true, it creates the DB schema if it does not exist. If the DB schema exists is a NOP. If set to false, it does not create the DB schema. If the DB schema does not exist it fails start up.

property.name: oozie.service.PurgeService.coord.older.than
property.description: Completed coordinator jobs older than this value, in days, will be purged by the PurgeService.

property.name: oozie.service.WorkflowAppService.system.libpath
property.description: System library path to use for workflow applications. This path is added to workflow application if their job properties sets the property 'oozie.use.system.libpath' to true.

property.name: oozie.service.ActionService.exception.override
property.description: List of overrides which would be applied to exceptions thrown in action. action-class-glob-pattern=exception-class-name[error-type or ?|error-code or ?] eg)*=java.lang.Exception[NON_TRANSIENT|?]

property.name: oozie.service.CoordMaterializeTriggerService.lookup.interval
property.description: Coordinator Job Lookup trigger command is scheduled at this "interval" (in seconds).

property.name: oozie.service.XLogService.trim
property.description: If set to true, log does not display if parameter is null and use the action name instead id.

property.name: oozie.service.CallableQueueService.callable.next.eligible
property.description: If true, when a callable in the queue has already reached max concurrency, Oozie continuously find next one which has not yet reach max concurrency.

property.name: oozie.service.CallableQueueService.callable.concurrency
property.description: Maximum concurrency for a given callable type. Each command is a callable type (submit, start, run, signal, job, jobs, suspend,resume, etc). Each action type is a callable type (Map-Reduce, Pig, SSH, FS, sub-workflow, etc). All commands that use action executors (action-start, action-end, action-kill and action-check) use the action type as the callable type.
